analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#337-338) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#434-471)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#549-570)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#646-656)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#667-678)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#742-751) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#481-503):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#496-498)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#499)
empty in SpectreSubscriber2Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#915) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in SpectreSubscriber2Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#961-964) is a local variable never initialiazed

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#774-790) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#787-789)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#710) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#751-753)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#742-751)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#749-750

SpectreSubscriber2Token.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#921-925)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#923-925

MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#308)
SpectreSubscriber2Token.saleEnd should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x89e317b5a84368550358f9772698854738edd149.sol#863)
